descriptionMdByRank.1: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by **3%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by **3.75%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by **4.5%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by **5.25%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by **6%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
